# AkademiTrack - STU Tidsregistrering **Version:** v1.0.0 Automatisk oppmøteregistrering for STU-økter på Akademiet / Automated attendance registration for STU sessions at Akademiet
## ⚠️ Important Notice **This is version 1.0.0 - Testing phase not yet complete.** Please expect potential bugs and report any issues you encounter. --- ## 🇳🇴 Norsk ### Om Programmet AkademiTrack er et automatiseringsverktøy som hjelper studenter ved Akademiet med å registrere oppmøte for STU (Selvstendige Terminoppgaver) økter automatisk. Programmet overvåker timeplandata og registrerer oppmøte når registreringsvinduene åpner seg. ### Hovedfunksjoner - **Automatisk innlogging**: Bruker nettleser for sikker autentisering mot iSkole systemet - **Intelligent overvåking**: Overvåker kun aktuelle STU-økter for gjeldende dag - **Optimalisert ytelse**: Gjør kun én API-forespørsel per dag for å hente timeplandata - **Sanntids registrering**: Registrerer oppmøte automatisk når registreringsvinduene åpner - **Detaljert logging**: Omfattende loggføring med mulighet for detaljerte debug-meldinger - **System notifikasjoner**: Diskrete overlay-notifikasjoner for viktige hendelser - **Innstillinger**: Konfigurerbar logging og programinnstillinger ### Installasjon og Oppsett #### macOS 1. Last ned `AkademiTrack.app` fra [[releases siden](https://github.com/CyberGutta/AkademiTrack/releases)](https://github.com/CyberGutta/AkademiTrack/releases) 2. Etter nedlasting, kjør denne kommandoen i Terminal for å fjerne karantene-attributter: ```bash xattr -cr ~/Downloads/AkademiTrack.app ``` (Erstatt `~/Downloads/` med faktisk plassering av programmet) 3. Dobbeltklikk for å kjøre programmet #### Linux 1. Last ned Linux-versjonen fra [[releases siden](https://github.com/CyberGutta/AkademiTrack/releases)](https://github.com/CyberGutta/AkademiTrack/releases) 2. Pakk ut den nedlastede filen 3. Naviger til mappen i terminal og kjør: ```bash chmod +x ./AkademiTrack # Test kjøring ./AkademiTrack ``` #### Windows 1. Last ned `AkademiTrack.exe` fra [[releases siden](https://github.com/CyberGutta/AkademiTrack/releases)](https://github.com/CyberGutta/AkademiTrack/releases) 2. Kjør filen direkte ### Hvordan Det Fungerer 1. **Start automatisering**: Klikk på "Start Automatisering" knappen 2. **Første gangs innlogging**: Nettleser åpnes for sikker pålogging til iSkole 3. **Cookie lagring**: Autentisering lagres sikkert for fremtidige økter 4. **Overvåking starter**: Programmet henter dagens STU-økter og overvåker registreringsvinduene 5. **Automatisk registrering**: Når et registreringsvindu åpner, registreres oppmøte automatisk 6. **Fullføring**: Programmet stopper når alle økter for dagen er behandlet ### Kjente Problemer - **Linux Auto-start Bug**: Auto-start funksjonalitet fungerer ikke på Linux. Dette vil bli fikset i en senere oppdatering. --- ## 🇺🇸 English ### About the Program AkademiTrack is an automation tool that helps students at Akademiet (a Norwegian school) automatically register attendance for STU (Independent Term Projects) sessions. The program monitors schedule data and registers attendance when registration windows open. ### Key Features - **Automatic login**: Uses browser for secure authentication against the iSkole system - **Intelligent monitoring**: Only monitors relevant STU sessions for the current day - **Optimized performance**: Makes only one API request per day to fetch schedule data - **Real-time registration**: Automatically registers attendance when registration windows open - **Detailed logging**: Comprehensive logging with option for detailed debug messages - **System notifications**: Discrete overlay notifications for important events - **Settings**: Configurable logging and program settings ### Installation and Setup #### macOS 1. Download `AkademiTrack.app` from the [[releases page](https://github.com/CyberGutta/AkademiTrack/releases)](https://github.com/CyberGutta/AkademiTrack/releases) 2. After downloading, run this command in Terminal to remove quarantine attributes: ```bash xattr -cr ~/Downloads/AkademiTrack.app ``` (Replace `~/Downloads/` with the actual location of the program) 3. Double-click to run the application #### Linux 1. Download the Linux version from the [[releases page](https://github.com/CyberGutta/AkademiTrack/releases)](https://github.com/CyberGutta/AkademiTrack/releases) 2. Extract the downloaded file 3. Navigate to the folder in terminal and run: ```bash chmod +x ./AkademiTrack # Test run ./AkademiTrack ``` #### Windows 1. Download `AkademiTrack.exe` from the [[releases page](https://github.com/CyberGutta/AkademiTrack/releases)](https://github.com/CyberGutta/AkademiTrack/releases) 2. Run the file directly ### How It Works 1. **Start automation**: Click the "Start Automatisering" (Start Automation) button 2. **First-time login**: Browser opens for secure login to iSkole 3. **Cookie storage**: Authentication is stored securely for future sessions 4. **Monitoring begins**: Program fetches today's STU sessions and monitors registration windows 5. **Automatic registration**: When a registration window opens, attendance is automatically registered 6. **Completion**: Program stops when all sessions for the day have been handled ### Known Issues - **Linux Auto-start Bug**: Auto-start functionality doesn't work on Linux. This will be fixed in a future update. --- ## Systemkrav / System Requirements - **Operativsystem / Operating System**: Windows, macOS, Linux - **Internett / Internet**: Stabil internettforbindelse / Stable internet connection - **Tilgang / Access**: Gyldig iSkole konto ved Akademiet / Valid iSkole account at Akademiet ## Sikkerhet og Personvern / Security and Privacy - **Lokalt lagret data / Locally stored data**: Alle cookies og data lagres kun lokalt på din maskin / All cookies and data are stored only locally on your machine - **Ingen datainnsamling / No data collection**: Programmet sender ikke personopplysninger til utvikleren / Program does not send personal information to the developer - **Sikker autentisering / Secure authentication**: Bruker offisiell iSkole innloggingsmetode / Uses official iSkole login method - **Automatisk opprydding / Automatic cleanup**: Gamle logger og data slettes automatisk / Old logs and data are automatically deleted ## Feilsøking / Troubleshooting **Problem**: Automatisering stopper uventet / Automation stops unexpectedly - **Løsning / Solution**: Start på nytt for å få nye autentisering-cookies / Restart to get new authentication cookies **Problem**: Ingen STU-økter funnet / No STU sessions found - **Løsning / Solution**: Kontroller at du har STU-økter i timeplanen din for i dag / Check that you have STU sessions in your schedule for today ## Support For teknisk support eller spørsmål / For technical support or questions: - Opprett en [[issue](https://github.com/CyberGutta/AkademiTrack/issues)](https://github.com/CyberGutta/AkademiTrack/issues) i GitHub repository - Kontakt utviklerne direkte / Contact the developers directly ## Contributors - **Andreas Nilsen** ([[@CyberNilsen](https://github.com/CyberNilsen)](https://github.com/CyberNilsen)) - **Mathias Hansen** ([[@CyberHansen](https://github.com/CyberHansen)](https://github.com/CyberHansen)) ## Versjon / Version **Gjeldende versjon / Current version**: 1.0.0 ### Changelog #### v1.0.0 - Initial release - Notification queuing system implemented - Tutorial improvements - Known issue: Linux auto-start functionality not working ## Lisens / License This project is licensed under the MIT License - see the [[LICENSE](https://claude.ai/chat/LICENSE)](LICENSE) file for details. ## Ansvarsfraskrivelse / Disclaimer Dette verktøyet er designet for å hjelpe studenter med legitim oppmøteregistrering. Brukere er ansvarlige for å sikre at bruken deres overholder skolens retningslinjer og akademiske integritetsstandarder. This tool is designed to assist students with legitimate attendance registration. Users are responsible for ensuring their use complies with school policies and academic integrity standards. --- **Website**: [[cybergutta.github.io/AkademietTrack](https://cybergutta.github.io/AkademietTrack/)](https://cybergutta.github.io/AkademietTrack/) **Topics**: education, automation, csharp, cross-platform, dotnet, norwegian, selenium, http-client, gui-application, desktop-application, avalonia, web-scraping, notification-system, attendance-tracking, cookie-management, student-tools, avalonia-ui, school-automation, akademiet
